title: Hp laptop
review: The worst product ever I came across.. mostly drivers are not available and customer care of HP is the worst one beyond comparison. Most of the drivers are not available for window versions and higher window versions are not supported by the system configuration. Example is wifi driver for windows 7 not available. Customer care executive after multiple calls and waiting for 15-20 minutes on phone simply replies not available. Nothing can annoy you more that customer care service I bet. Poor product equally matching customer responsiveness.You got to be tech savvy to purchase a computer electronic from flipkart otherwise u will be cheated by the nexus of flipkart retailer. On top of that flipkart don't even entertain return request citing bogus rerun policy which revives the concept of caveat emptor. I got my lesson and hope that I wud get guts before ordering anything from flipkart.

title: Brilliant
review: Nice one. Just upgrade it to windows 10 and you will have a cheap and best laptop. Note that windows 10 (and not win 7, 8, 8.1) is officially supported by this laptop (check HP website) and if you try to install windows 7 you will have driver issues for usb (becomes unsupported), bluetooth, wi-fi and several others. Better to install win 8 at least, if you don't like windows 10 (usb works in win 8 but you will have to download drivers for wi-fi and bluetooth manually and it will work like charm).

title: Worthless
review:
1.PRODUCT QUALITY: 4.5/5 (depends on luck)
2.PERFORMANCE: 4/5 (best for office use)
3.GAMING: 3.5/5 (normal games like R6 vegas can be played good, but not for high intensive games like WWE 2K18)
4.BATTERY: 4.5/5 (lasts 5.2 hours on movies)
5.DISPLAY: 4.2/5 (its crisp and good but no FHD)
6.PROCESSOR: 3.5/5 (poor processor_Intel Pentium Quad Core)
7.ROM: 1 TB ( 1024GB)
8.RAM: 4GB DDR 3 old model
9.WARRANTY: Cheats us giving 10 months onsite only.
10. OPERATING SYSTEM: ONLY WINDOWS 10, others are not supportive.(Some features wont work.
OVERALL SCORE: its a decent device for office users and low end multimedia purposes. You have to install Windows 10 pro and drivers(available in HP support website).
...LIFESAVER FOR STUDENTS AND OFFICERS.
...HELL FOR GAMERS

title: Worst experience ever!
review: Had a really bad experience with recent purchase of this product from Flipkart.  I am very disappointed because after getting the laptop when I have switched it on the for the first time. It was showing a black blank screen on the display instead of options, or boot screen. I wrote to Flipkart for help and raised a ticket for the same. Flipkart people said they can't replace it and instead arranged for a service. The service engineer was not even courteous to pay a visit to my location, instead he chose to call me over the phone. And after the initial discussion, he just closed the case from his end. So I called again and the same process repeated. In the end, I had to take it to a service center at my expense to get it rectified. Flipkart didn't even help me with the product service/replacement even after repeated complaints, so I lost my time, effort and money which I could have saved if I had purchased the same from other shopping  site. Very Disappointed with Flipkart and your  support center, they should learn to respect customers. There is no option for return or replacement.
